item.description:
ICE SKATING PARTY
TC: Heather P. (heather925@att.net ) and David G. (dgoldsmith38@aol.com. For the day
of the event only, cell:781-910-4154)

EVENT: We will go ice skating at a nice indoor rink in Watertown for about an hour and a half, then go to Starbucks afterwards for hot drinks and conversation.
RSVP: REQUIRED. Name and address of rink will be provided to those who RSVP
MEET: Sunday March 16th, 1:45pm.
COST: The cost for public skating is $6 and skate rental is $4 and $5 for non-members
item.how_to_find_us: Contact a trip coordinator for plans
item.why: This time of year isn't usually that great outside and this will be a good chance to get together for some fun.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Ice Skating Party in Watertown
